Package bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.gui

Class ButtonEditor

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.AbstractCellEditor
javax.swing.DefaultCellEditor
bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.gui.ButtonEditor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, CellEditor, TableCellEditor, TreeCellEditor
public class ButtonEditor extends DefaultCellEditor
The ButtonEditor class represents a custom cell editor for a JTable that contains buttons. It is used to display book details when a button in the table is clicked.
See Also:
